readme <- "REPLACE_ME\n=======\n\nREPLACE_ME is a package that...\n\n## Installation\n\nTo download the development version of REPLACE_ME:\n\ndownload the [zip ball]() or [tar ball](), decompress and run `R CMD INSTALL` on it, or use the **devtools** package to install the development version:\n\n```r\n# install.packages(\"devtools\")\n\nlibrary(devtools)\ninstall_github(\"REPLACE_ME\", \"\")\n```\n\n\n## Help\n  \n\n## Contact\n\nYou are welcome to:\n* submit suggestions and bug-reports at: <>\n* send a pull request on: <>\n* compose a friendly e-mail to: <>\n"
